description:
There exist those with special abilities to manipulate objects and transform them into other objects called the Alchemists. However, this manipulation process comes at a price, since the basic alchemy rules state that something with equivalent value is needed to perform the manipulation.
The renowned alchemist http://anidb.net/ch5885 [Edward Elric] loses his little brother http://anidb.net/ch5908 [Alphonse] in an accident. Edward manages to contain his brother`s soul in a large piece of armour suit, but by doing so Edward loses his arm and leg. And so the brothers set out on a perilous journey to regain their original bodies.
Source: AnimeNfo
